title: Full Stack Developer
description: Lead development of web applications using React, Angular, and Node.js. Implemented microservices architecture, improved application performance by 40%, and mentored junior developers. Established CI/CD pipelines and containerized applications with Docker.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed responsive web applications and user interfaces. Collaborated with design teams to create pixel-perfect implementations. Optimized existing codebase resulting in 25% faster load times.

title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Graduated with honors. Focused on software engineering principles, algorithms, and data structures. Active member of the Computing Society and developed several academic projects.

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Learning practical web development skills while contributing to real projects. Worked on both frontend and backend components, gaining experience with modern development practices.
